using namespace std;
 
ll gcd(ll a,ll b)
{
	if(b==0)return a;
	else return (gcd(b,a%b));
}
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
int main()
{
  ll t,m,n,num,den,i,a,num1,num2;
  sl(t);
  while(t--)
  {
    scanf("%lld %lld",&m,&n);
    num1=((m+1)/2)*(n/2);
    num2=(m/2)*((n+1)/2);
    num=num1+num2;
    den=n*m;
    a=__gcd(num,den);
    num/=a;den/=a;
    printf("%lld/%lld\n",num,den);
 
  }
  return 0;
}
